posts.title: Tree Name
posts.text: Each sapling (tree) has a unique name, the name can be changed after purchasing a token. C02 tokens will be burned to change the name

posts.title: Image
posts.text: We will update the image every 6 months until it takes its final shape. Each image will be engraved with the exact coordinates of your tree

posts.title: Tree age
posts.text: The age of the tree will be counted from the moment of planting the seedlings in the ground and denoted by years and days

posts.title: SEQ tokens
posts.text: Each tree (NFT token) generates a certain number of ERC20 tokens per day. The number of tokens generated = the amount of C02 absorbed by the tree
